cars.description: This car is awesome!  It's been wrecked 11 times and it still runs.  A great buy!
Just like new!  Leather interior, sunroof, and all the other fancy stuff.
With only 20,000 miles, this car is in great shape.
This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
